roleset.name: lead, conduct
roleset.note: PRESIDE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'preside' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from preside.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: object always takes 'over'
example.text: Today, Mr. Corry presides over a company whose fortunes have changed abruptly.
example.arg: over a company whose fortunes have changed abruptly

example.name: ARG1 and ARG0
example.text: Appointed to the federal bench in 1979 , he was charged two years later with conspiracy to accept a bribe in a case he presided over in Miami .
